summary: Tells the story of the Spanish invasion of Flanders
cast: Françoise Rosay|André Alerme|Jean Murat|Louis Jouvet|Lyne Clevers|Micheline Cheirel|Maryse Wendling|Ginette Gaubert|Marguerite Ducouret|Bernard Lancret|Alfred Adam|Pierre Labry|Arthur Devère|Marcel Carpentier|Alexander D'Arcy|Claude Sainval|Delphin|Paul Hartman|Pierre Athon|Francine Bessy|Will Dohm|Enrico Glori|Marianne Hardy|Roger Legris|Matt Mattox|Rafael Medina|Myrillis|Rolla Norman|Bernard Optal|Molly Robert|Georges Spanelly|Maurice Tillet|Yvonne Yma
title: La kermesse heroica
